name: Knights of Valour: Yi Tong Zhong Yuan
overview: In addition to Capcom's "Three Kingdoms", the arcade market has a not very famous Three Kingdoms action game, Taiwan's IGS launched its "Three Kingdoms" version. Although, at the end of the 90s, not many people played the game outside Asia, Taiwan's IGS is still a solid alternative for this type of game, as well as the development of a variety of very rich and quite refreshing arcade games.
